parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF: 11240014) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a Senator candidate for AUR (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor) in Bistrița-Năsăud, mentioning his position on the ballot ("Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!"). This clearly identifies a parliamentary candidate and fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience ("reach_estimate": ">1M").  It's not a private communication; it's designed for public consumption, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's content aims to influence voters' choices. It highlights Cosma's candidacy, promotes AUR's platform (linking to planulsimion.ro and programaur.ro), and criticizes opposing candidates and parties. The overall objective is to garner votes for Dan Cosma and AUR, thus fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The mention of "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!" directly encourages voters to vote for him.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post presents some political commentary, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic work.  It's highly partisan, using strong language ("atacul disperat," "minciună," "trădare") to attack opponents and promote AUR's narrative. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of impartiality and fact-checking.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion. It's a carefully crafted piece of political communication designed to sway public opinion in favor of a specific candidate and party. The strong, accusatory language and direct calls to action ("Pe 1 și 8 decembrie, să arătăm lumii întregi...") are not characteristic of a personal opinion piece.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>593615980022376</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, given its CMF number, explicit mention of Dan Cosma's candidacy, targeting of a large audience, and clear intention to influence voters, strongly suggests electoral propaganda.  The content is partisan, lacks journalistic objectivity, and directly encourages voters to support Dan Cosma and AUR.  The post's language is inflammatory and designed to generate support for the candidate.  The provided links to AUR's platform further solidify its purpose as electoral propaganda.  The fact that it's a paid advertisement amplifies its reach and impact.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>DAN COSMA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Dan Cosma], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 593615980022376) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care conține propagandă electorală pentru candidatul AUR Dan Cosma,  cu un buget de 200-299 RON,  ajungând la peste 1 milion de oameni,  prin utilizarea CMF-ului 11240014,  menționarea explicită a poziției sale pe buletinul de vot și atacuri la adresa candidaților contracandidați,  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea lui Dan Cosma și AUR.  Postarea, deși mascată sub forma unui comentariu politic,  este lipsită de obiectivitate și neutralitate jurnalistică,  utilizând un limbaj inflamator și apeluri directe la acțiune,  constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: cosdan63@gmail.com și +407666663210.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
